title: In the News Today - October 12, 2015 (ILR - Institute for Legal Reform)
text: ( Source : ILR - Institute for Legal Reform ) In rejecting the settlement of a shareholder lawsuit against Hewletter-Packard Co., a Delaware judge said 'the welter of litigation challenging corporate mergers has become a systemic problem.'
